entry.tran: (负责开门或上菜的)男仆，侍者
entry.def: A footman is a male servant who typically does jobs such as opening doors or serving food, and who often wears a special uniform.

means.word_mean: 1. a man employed as a servant in a large establishment (as a palace) to run errands and do chores
